FROMPIC(6D)                                         FROMPIC(6D)





NAME
       frompic  -  convert  a  MOVIE  BYU .PIC image to an IRIS
       image

SYNOPSIS
       frompic inimage.PIC outimage.rgb

DESCRIPTION
       frompic converts a MOVIE BYU .PIC  image  file  to  IRIS
       image file format.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004               FROMPIC(6D)
